a piszę tę recenzje tylko i wyłączenie z powodu eventu na Steam Grand Prix,
Jedno z zadań które mi zostało do zrobienia to właśnie napisanie recenzji aby móc wybrać więcej punktów które uzyskałem w innych grach i móc dogonić jakiegoś patałacha z mojej listy znajomych który się zwie "Ten typ od matmy".Wiec skurwielu że nie spocznę i Cię dogonię.

Overall, the 2nd best Counter Strike there is.
Movement and mechanics are flawless and a huge community of modders and custom content creators.
Only minimalistic downside are the mass amounts of russians and moderately large head hitboxes.
Good game, It really is a blast to head back to the past and see how games are.
Best game ever made, just remove some cheaters and get some more players and i would love this game again.
Перешёл в эту игру из CS:GO.Так и не пожалел.
Best shooter ever made, better than that shitty GO version. ((=

Movement feels so much better than csgo

First of all I would like to introduce myself. My name is Vladimir and I was born in Balkan . Balkan is the place where the Counter Strike serial has a cult symbol , literally there is no person in the gaming world in Balkan that did not play Counter Strike games. In 2005, i was 10-year old boy , who got his first pc and install cracked version of Counter Strike 1.6 and immediately fell in love with game. I spent many hours every day playing the game with my friends for the next 8 years . CS 1.6 was a part of my life and deserves a special place in my heart. The first CS which I bought was CS GO in 2013 . Then I discovered  that counter strike GO has no soul ,  just stress and you must to pay for weapon skins ,  graffiti , crates and keys . Still I played the game  and  spent 1100+ hours in game . The reason I decided to stop playing cs go and delete it is their decision to make CS GO F2P . Now the CS GO is hacker paradise and has very toxic comunity . Yesterday I bought CS Source on steam sale , and I tried it for the first time. I fell in love again! I can not describe you my happiness while I was playing . Strong emotions....Nostalgia....Pure CS feeling. Counter-Strike Source is probably the best CS game, in my opinion. It's basically Counter-Strike 1.6 with better graphics, better physics and better maps. Game have small but friendly old school community and doesn't have hackers . I recommend game to all old school players , see you on the server ;)
